about_the_game:
BooBooBooster is a new side-scrolling 2D action shooter that combines attacking and jumping.

It can be easily played with only two buttons!

However, despite the pop graphics, the difficulty level of the attack is too difficult to clear in a single step.

Enemies and gimmicks await the main character, which cannot be broken through by simple operation!

Occasionally, the way is also obstructed by the simple but peculiar controls...

There are 25 stages in total, and each stage has 3 missions! You may have a hard time collecting the missions so that you have to try several times.

As a reward for accomplishing such missions, you will receive points that can make your player stronger!

Try to clear all the stages while collecting the missions!

Story

--The year is 20XX and the setting is New Tokyo.

Suddenly, a huge object in the shape of a peach crashed down,

Most of the New Tokyo urban area was destroyed.

Soon after, butt-shaped unidentified creatures begin to appear all over Japan.

The frightening thing they have in common is that they project their excrement onto humans,

Their power was expanding day by day, causing people to suffer. ......

In the midst of all this, a young man who loves potatoes got his hands on a mysterious potato...!
detailed_description:
BooBooBooster is a new side-scrolling 2D action shooter that combines attacking and jumping.

It can be easily played with only two buttons!

However, despite the pop graphics, the difficulty level of the attack is too difficult to clear in a single step.

Enemies and gimmicks await the main character, which cannot be broken through by simple operation!

Occasionally, the way is also obstructed by the simple but peculiar controls...

There are 25 stages in total, and each stage has 3 missions! You may have a hard time collecting the missions so that you have to try several times.

As a reward for accomplishing such missions, you will receive points that can make your player stronger!

Try to clear all the stages while collecting the missions!

Suddenly, a huge object in the shape of a peach crashed down,

Most of the New Tokyo urban area was destroyed.

Soon after, butt-shaped unidentified creatures begin to appear all over Japan.

Their power was expanding day by day, causing people to suffer. ......

name: Boo Boo Booster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Fly with a fart! Defeat the enemy with a fart! Save Japan!？ Attack and jump are integrated, and you can play with just two buttons! 2D action shooting with easy controls!
